Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory286.png'}
{3: 'While Babylonia is falling...'}
{3: '—Somewhere in the universe is a once bustling town. Now devoid of any occupants, the buildings and houses have become nothing but concrete and rebar gravestones.'}
{3: 'Only the occasional red streams can be seen coursing around the crystalline pillars.'}
{3: 'And between the pillars, three figures—one tiny, two big—are strolling through the town without a care in the world.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Booooring! Boring boring, it's so boring! Martin, come up with something fun!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Martin', 3: 'Stop being such a child, Nanami.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Nyehh! I knew I couldn't count on you! Rohacchi, tell me a new explorer unit joke!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rohacchi', 3: 'No. More. All. Hundred. Used up. In one day.', 4: '3'}
{3: 'Nanami turns to squint at the two mechanoids.'}
{2: 'Martin', 3: '...What is it?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rohacchi', 3: 'Rohacchi. Does not. Get it.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Can't you two just, act a little happier?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Martin', 3: 'You dragged us all the way here... without a single explanation...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rohacchi', 3: 'Nanami. Wants. Rohacchi. To go. Then. Rohacchi. Goes.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I told you already! We're playing a game! And the game is about going on a journey!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "And what's a journey without companions?! That's why you both are here!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Martin', 3: 'Never heard of that before...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rohacchi', 3: 'Nanami. Where. Are. You. Bringing. Rohacchi?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Let's see... there's this nagging mecha babushka... You know, the kind that lives in outer space...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "And this mecha babushka wants to talk with Nanami, but Nanami's voice isn't loud enough...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "So it gave me some coordinates to a loudspeaker that can send Nanami's voice to the heavens!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "But since it'll be bor... Ahem, I mean, dangerous on the road, I got my two amigos here to protect me!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rohacchi', 3: 'That. Is. Just. How. She. Is.', 4: '3'}
